description:
The Turbo features an improved taper for faster placement. It is meticulously made. The minimalist hanger contributes to its light weight and bites into your palm for easy placement. It is also easy grab and to rack.

  • Made of chromoly steel
  • Four bevelled teeth
  • For ease of placement, teeth cut a hole slightly wider than the shaft
  • Hanger takes one carabiner
  • Four sizes: 13, 16, 19, and 22cm
  • CE approved
name: Black Diamond Turbo Ice Screw
